property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's never good to walk into an ambush, but with the right spell you might walk out again.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Cavalry Pegasus attacks, each attacking Human gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is hope, hooved and winged." - Cymede, queen of Akros

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {5}{W}{W} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Flying, first strike Enchanted creature gets +4/+4 and has flying and first strike.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant Mountain you control When Chained to the Rocks enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Chained to the Rocks leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Chosen by Heliod enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature gets +0/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Training and studies aid a soldier in meager amounts. The gods do the rest." - Brigone, soldier of Meletis

property.name: Rules
property.value: Up to two target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The people of Akros must learn from our leonin adversaries. If we match their staunch ferocity with our superior faith, we cannot fail." - Cymede, queen of Akros

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}{W}: Prevent the next 1 combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The awards and medals of polis-dwellers mean nothing to griffins, but they repay acts of generosity.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The last thing to go through the cyclops's mind was a twelve-ton block of marble.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. −3: Destroy all creatures with power 4 or greater. −7: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have flying."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Tap target creature with power 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you threaten the sanctity of the polis, you insult Ephara herself. If she doesn't smite you, I will."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Evangel of Heliod enters the battlefield, create a number of 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens equal to your devotion to white. (Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double strike Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Fabled Hero, put a +1/+1 counter on Fabled Hero.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You. Poet. Be sure to write this down."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Favored Hoplite, put a +1/+1 counter on Favored Hoplite and prevent all damage that would be dealt to it this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. Return Gift of Immortality to the battlefield attached to that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No foe is more hated than the former friend.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that color.) Scry 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Honor the gods of Theros, and they will return the favor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Indestructible As long as your devotion to white is less than five, Heliod isn't a creature. (Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.) Other creatures you control have vigilance. {2}{W}{W}: Create a 2/1 white Cleric enchantment creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {6}{W} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Whenever Heliod's Emissary or enchanted creature attacks, tap target creature an opponent controls. Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {3}{W} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.) Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has lifelink.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance {3}{W}{W}{W}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) As long as Hundred-Handed One is monstrous, it has reach and can block an additional ninety-nine creatures each combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Lagonna-Band Elder enters the battlefield, if you control an enchantment, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The best lessons are not the ones I teach. They are the ones the pupils realize for themselves."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature with power 2 or less. Its controller gains 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In time, all things turn to dust. Some things just take less time.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Leonin Snarecaster enters the battlefield, you may tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Formerly oppressed by the polis of Meletis, leonin occasionally "mistake" their old enemies for game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {4}{W} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Vigilance Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Heliod. When you sacrifice Ordeal of Heliod, you gain 10 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Phalanx Leader, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His soldiers etch his words on the insides of their shields, their inspiration always in sight during battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target enchantment. You gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The works of one god last only as long as the patience of another.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{B}: Each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She asks pointed questions of the dead who wait for Athreos, learning of life from those who are about to leave it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Setessan Battle Priest, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your god teaches you only how to kill. Karametra teaches me to defend what I hold dear. That is why I will prevail."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {2}{G}{G}: Setessan Griffin gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most griffins must be caught and broken into the service of the polis. Not so in Setessa, where they volunteer.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On the fourth day they passed through a forest of immense stacked stones. Althemone, youngest of the companions, called these pillars the work of a god, but the Champion knew better. She quickened her pace. - The Theriad

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from multicolored Whenever an opponent casts a multicolored spell, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I hear the gods' voices in my dreams each night, and I offer bloody trophies on their altars each day."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +1/+1. {1}{W}{W}, {T}: Destroy target creature that dealt damage to you this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Legend speaks of the Sun Spear, the mighty weapon that can strike any point in Theros, even the depths of the Underworld.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Champion and the philosopher Olexa returned from the opposing camp at dusk. Behind them, the enemy raised sail and departed, breaking the siege. When asked what the two had done, the Champion replied, "We spoke to them." - The Theriad

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Wingsteed Rider, put a +1/+1 counter on Wingsteed Rider.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Trust is the only bridle a pegasus will accept.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It was in fields of grain, not fields of battle, that the Champion learned to bear the yoke of duty to the gods. She worked the land long before she was called on to defend it. - The Theriad

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target artifact or enchantment spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why pray to the gods, who feed on your worship? Dissolve your illusions and see the true nature of things." - Xenagos, the Reveler

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked. Whenever enchanted creature attacks, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Artisan of Forms, you may have Artisan of Forms become a copy of target creature, except it has this ability.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some fates you can see coming for you, plain as day, and there's nothing you can do about them." - Callaphe the mariner

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. {1}{U}, {T}: Creatures your opponents control attack this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wills of mortals shift as the tide ebbs and flows.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Breaching Hippocamp enters the battlefield, untap another target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't try to ride this steed unless you've got gills too.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}{W}: Coastline Chimera can block an additional creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Seeing a chimera overhead foretells good fortune, but only because seeing one any closer foretells dismemberment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{R}, Sacrifice Crackling Triton: It deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He calls upon both the currents in the sea and the current in the clouds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile X target creatures. For each creature exiled this way, its controller creates a 2/2 green Boar creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Another imminent battle subsided in busy snuffling and carefree rooting.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You thought only the gods could stop you?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Fate Foretold enters the battlefield, draw a card. When enchanted creature dies, its controller draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The tale of her life was already written, but that didn't mean she could predict the ending.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You dryfolk must take the air for granted. You constantly insist on wasting it." - Kenessos, priest of Thassa

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the sea god Thassa wishes to speak with a mortal, she does not issue a summons or grant a vision requesting a visit. The sea simply brings her guest before her.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Horizon Scholar enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even those who leave the labyrinth never escape it, forever dreaming of their time trapped within.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from red Elemental creatures you control get +1/+1. When Master of Waves enters the battlefield, create a number of 1/0 blue Elemental creature tokens equal to your devotion to blue. (Each {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{U}, {T}: The controller of target instant or sorcery spell copies it. That player may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every object has an echo in the Æther beyond the world. Every idea has a shadow that can be brought to light."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender When Mnemonic Wall enters the battlefield, you may return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It augments anamnesis. What is so confusing about that?" - Perisophia the philosopher

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {4}{U} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Flying Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Omenspeaker enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her prophecies amaze her even as she speaks them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Thassa. When you sacrifice Ordeal of Thassa, draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Discard a card: Prognostic Sphinx gains hexproof until end of turn. Tap it. Whenever Prognostic Sphinx attacks, scry 3.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return up to three target creatures your opponents control to their owners' hands. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What has neither mouth nor throat, yet swallows captain, crew, and boat?" - Sphinx's riddle

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sealock Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. {5}{U}{U}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Sealock Monster becomes monstrous, target land becomes an Island in addition to its other types.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {6}{U}{U}: Monstrosity 4. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put four +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Shipbreaker Kraken becomes monstrous, tap up to four target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps for as long as you control Shipbreaker Kraken.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When a god's will is against you, the day never ends well.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target enchantment, instant, or sorcery spell. Its controller creates a 2/2 blue Bird creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The most enlightened mages create beauty from violence." - Medomai the Ageless

property.name: Rules
property.value: Indestructible As long as your devotion to blue is less than five, Thassa isn't a creature. (Each {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue.) At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1. {1}{U}: Target creature you control can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards. Target player mills three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Was this gift cast adrift for any to find, or did Thassa guide the currents to bring it to me alone?" - Kenessos, priest of Thassa

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {5}{U} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Whenever Thassa's Emissary or enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card. Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Triton Fortune Hunter, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Thassa has blessed me with power and insight. I am careful not to disappoint her."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At sunrise, the Champion and her companions awoke to find their supplies gone and Brygus, their sentry, dead. Carefully arranged piles of ornamental shells gave a clear warning: go no further. - The Theriad

property.name: Rules
property.value: Up to two target creatures each get +0/+3 until end of turn. Untap those creatures. At this turn's next end of combat, tap each creature that was blocked by one of those creatures this turn and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Vaporkin can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mists are carefree. They drift where they will, unencumbered by rocks and river beds." - Thrasios, triton hero

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Philosophers say those lost at sea ascended to a more perfect realm. Sailors say they drowned.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Wavecrash Triton, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Abhorrent Overlord enters the battlefield, create a number of 1/1 black Harpy creature tokens with flying equal to your devotion to black. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.) At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Agent of the Fates, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He killed out of hate, so now only hate sustains him. He sought immortality, so the gods gave it to him.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {4}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has deathtouch.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Blood-Toll Harpy enters the battlefield, each player loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When harpies demand a toll to cross through their territory, consider yourself lucky if they permit payment in coin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Regenerate it. You lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Death is not a certainty. Erebos determines when a mortal's time is up." - Iadorna, death priest of Erebos

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {5}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has intimidate.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+1 and gain lifelink until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our ambition drives us forward. Together we will claim what is ours, no matter who holds it."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You're just like me: ruthless, cunning, and ambitious. Obviously you're a threat." - Basarios the Blade

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Disciple of Phenax enters the battlefield, target player reveals a number of cards from their hand equal to your devotion to black. You choose one of them. That player discards that card. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Indestructible As long as your devotion to black is less than five, Erebos isn't a creature. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.) Your opponents can't gain life. {1}{B}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {5}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Discard a creature card: Erebos's Emissary gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If Erebos's Emissary is an Aura, enchanted creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn instead. Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With spear held high, the Champion came to meet Thyrogog of the Ashlands, who wore the old king's skin as a cloak and fed on the flesh of innocents. The foul minotaur raised the great axe called Goremaster and charged. - The Theriad

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature dies, tap Fleshmad Steed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: More disturbing than the unknown is a distortion of the familiar.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Gray Merchant of Asphodel enters the battlefield, each opponent loses X life, where X is your devotion to black. You gain life equal to the life lost this way. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Destiny exalts a chosen few, but even heroes break.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch {6}{B}{B}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Hythonia the Cruel becomes monstrous, destroy all non-Gorgon creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gold coin, battered helmet, broken wrist bone - all have the same value in the eyes of a harpy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch {5}{B}{B}: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Keepsake Gorgon becomes monstrous, destroy target non-Gorgon creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No matter who their fickle hearts worship, all mortals belong to one god in the end." - Iadorna, death priest of Erebos

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{G}: Loathsome Catoblepas must be blocked this turn if able. When Loathsome Catoblepas dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Returned have no memory of the Underworld or of their former lives. The golden masks they wear are the last gifts of the selves they left behind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Mogis's Marauder enters the battlefield, up to X target creatures each gain intimidate and haste until end of turn, where X is your devotion to black. (A creature with intimidate can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it. Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {2}{B}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Nighthowler and enchanted creature each get +X/+X, where X is the number of creature cards in all graveyards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Erebos. When you sacrifice Ordeal of Erebos, target player discards two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pharika's Cure deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The venom cleanses the sickness from your body, but it will not be pleasant, and you may not survive. Pharika's blessings are fickle." - Solon, acolyte of Pharika

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dead know lessons the living haven't learned.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Choose target creature card in your graveyard. Return that card and the sacrificed card to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of your next upkeep. Exile Rescue from the Underworld.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Returned Centaur enters the battlefield, target player mills four cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Driven away by his living kin, he wanders mourning through the wilderness, seeking the dead city of Asphodel.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {1}{U}: Returned Phalanx can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They lived in different nations and fought in different eras, but as the Returned, they link arms as one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Scourgemark enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature gets +1/+0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To members of the cult of Erebos, gold-infused tattoos symbolize the inevitable grasp of the god of death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Conspirators poisoned the oracle not because her visions were wrong, but because they were right.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Knowledge is such a burden. Release it. Release all your fears to me." - Ashiok, Nightmare Weaver

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tormented Hero enters the battlefield tapped. Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Tormented Hero, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -1/-1, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I could heal a snakebite. Looks like you got bitten by a constellation." - Aescalos, healer of Pharika

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have lifelink. {2}{B}{B}, {T}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. If it would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Akroan Crusader, create a 1/1 red Soldier creature token with haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An Akroan soldier's worth is measured by the number of swords raised by his battle cry.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Anger of the Gods deals 3 damage to each creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There was no reason to pray. This was already an act of the gods.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Arena Athlete, target creature an opponent controls can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Iroan Games award no medals. Athletes vie for a visit from Iroas, god of victory.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You have led us to triumph over the forces of Mogis!" said Brygus the Brave, clapping the Champion on the back. The Champion wiped the sweat and blood from her brow. "I count eight graves," she said. "Too many to call this a victory." - The Theriad

property.name: Rules
property.value: Boulderfall deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Defeating the Meletians was not so difficult. I needed only to move a mountain." - Eocles, oracle of Purphoros

property.name: Rules
property.value: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's hard to shout "Shields up!" with a javelin in your chest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathbellow Raider attacks each combat if able. {2}{B}: Regenerate Deathbellow Raider.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The temple has been rededicated. It belongs to Mogis now." - Rastos, disciple of Mogis

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When fire is shackled to candle and torch, subjected to insignificance, it finds a way to lash out at its masters." - Vala, disciple of Purphoros

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Dragon Mantle enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {5}{R}{R}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Ember Swallower becomes monstrous, each player sacrifices three lands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Fanatic of Mogis enters the battlefield, it deals damage to each opponent equal to your devotion to red. (Each {R} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to red.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Firedrinker Satyr is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to you. {1}{R}: Firedrinker Satyr gets +1/+0 until end of turn and deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Attending a satyr revel requires a high tolerance for pain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you scry, Flamespeaker Adept gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I see your future, mantled in ash."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have haste. {2}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice a land: Create a 3/3 colorless Golem enchantment artifact creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All the world is Purphoros's anvil.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample {5}{R}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A cyclops has two moods: angry and asleep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Labyrinth Champion, Labyrinth Champion deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It used to be a lair. Now it's just a tunnel."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The hand of Keranos can be seen in every rumbling storm cloud. Best not to stand where he points." - Rakleia of Shrine Peak

property.name: Rules
property.value: Magma Jet deals 2 damage to any target. Scry 2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has trample and haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He outran arrows. He outran even the archers' insults." - Bayma, storyteller of Lagonna Band

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste When Minotaur Skullcleaver enters the battlefield, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Their only dreams are of full stomachs." - Kleon the Iron-Booted

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Purphoros. When you sacrifice Ordeal of Purphoros, it deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target Mountain. Peak Eruption deals 3 damage to that land's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Early olive buds? A good omen. Flock of crows? Not so good. Mountain exploding? Bad. Very, very bad." - Hira, street oracle

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{W}, Sacrifice Priest of Iroas: Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even my last breath will be a blow struck for Iroas."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Indestructible As long as your devotion to red is less than five, Purphoros isn't a creature. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Purphoros deals 2 damage to each opponent. {2}{R}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {6}{R} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has menace.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rage of Purphoros deals 4 damage to target creature. It can't be regenerated this turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Other Minotaur creatures you control get +1/+1 and have trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I see a spark of pure rage. Soon that spark will spread from the depths of Kragma. Soon its fire will engulf the polis." - Hira, street oracle

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A satyr is bound by nothing - not home, not family, not loyalty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spark Jolt deals 1 damage to any target. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Acolytes of Purphoros hammer the world until they see the sparks of change.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {5}{R} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) First strike Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has first strike.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {6}{R}{R}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Stoneshock Giant becomes monstrous, creatures without flying your opponents control can't block this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste, protection from white {5}{R}{R}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Stormbreath Dragon becomes monstrous, it deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each Human creature you control has "{R}, {T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is no gift more precious or more perilous than fire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The left head keeps the right head starved as motivation to track new prey.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Wild Celebrants enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can tell something's really valuable by the sound it makes when you slam your staff into it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{U}: Agent of Horizons can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The light in the woods just before dawn reveals a glimmering network of branches, roots, and spiderwebs. The acolytes of Kruphix walk this lattice unseen.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Anthousa, Setessan Hero, up to three target lands you control each become 2/2 Warrior creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The warriors she leads can rarely keep pace with her, and neither can the tales.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach {3}{G}{G}{G}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Arbor Colossus becomes monstrous, destroy target creature with flying an opponent controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some seers read bones or entrails. Others just like to break things.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Bestow {3}{G}{G} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Enchanted creature gets +4/+2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacking creatures you control have deathtouch. {1}{G}, {T}: Choose one - • Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. • Bow of Nylea deals 2 damage to target creature with flying. • You gain 3 life. • Put up to four target cards from your graveyard on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Centaur Battlemaster, put three +1/+1 counters on Centaur Battlemaster.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A herd is only as strong as its weakest. Our weakest just killed his third minotaur raider - today." - Braulios of Pheres Band

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or enchantment card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the first time in many years, Elspeth asked for help.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to players this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The defenders said not a word. Their shields, spears, and stances were warning enough.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Are the gods angry at our discontent with what they give us, or jealous that we made a thing they cannot?" - Kleon the Iron-Booted

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nylea's sacred lynx guards those who honor the Nessian Wood and hunts those who don't.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target green creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. It fights target green creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A grudge is a tattoo worn on the inside." - Setessan warrior saying

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add an amount of {G} equal to your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The wilds are a garden tended by divine hands."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {3}{G} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Reach Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has reach.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Haste, protection from blue Mistcutter Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard. {7}{G}{G}: Monstrosity 5. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each creature card in your graveyard. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put five +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach {6}{G}: Monstrosity 4. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put four +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's not the two heads you should fear. It's the four fangs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Khestes the Adamant, the Champion's closest ally among the centaurs, took one stone to his shoulder and another to his flank. He held his stride and his aim, and let fly the arrow that killed the giant Grinthax. - The Theriad

property.name: Rules
property.value: Indestructible As long as your devotion to green is less than five, Nylea isn't a creature. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.) Other creatures you control have trample. {3}{G}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Nylea's Disciple enters the battlefield, you gain life equal to your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {5}{G} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Trample Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has trample.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land When Nylea's Presence enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted land is every basic land type in addition to its other types.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Nylea. When you sacrifice Ordeal of Nylea, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Poets speak of your unrivaled speed," the Champion said to the assembled centaurs, "but it is plain to see that your true strength lies in your unwavering loyalty to one another." - The Theriad

property.name: Rules
property.value: {X}{X}{G}: Monstrosity X. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put X +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Polukranos, World Eater becomes monstrous, it deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures your opponents control. Each of those creatures deals damage equal to its power to Polukranos.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Reverent Hunter enters the battlefield, put a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Any festival you can walk away from wasn't worth attending in the first place."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{G}: Target creature must be blocked this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When I asked my commander the reward for killing that prancing nuisance, he told me, ‘None! I want to kill him myself!'" - Phrogas, soldier of Akros

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Untap that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I thought its back was turned!" "A centaur has two backs!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thakolides the Mighty Slayer of minotaurs Vanquisher of giants Killed by a scorpion - Inscription on an Akroan grave

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shredding Winds deals 7 damage to target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Enemies of the wood! Your presence here is a slap in Nylea's face. Do not be surprised if she slaps back." - Telphe, druid of Nylea

property.name: Rules
property.value: Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Staunch-Hearted Warrior, put two +1/+1 counters on Staunch-Hearted Warrior.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As soon as she faces a monster, she begins composing its epitaph.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender, hexproof {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who enter the copse never leave. They find peace there and take root, becoming part of the ever-growing grove.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose target creature an opponent controls. When that creature dies this turn, you gain 3 life. Target creature you control fights that creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "None can own the land's bounty. The gods made this world for all to share its riches. And I'm not just saying that because you caught me stealing your fruit."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With a diet of hydras, giants, and massive serpents, anything would get that big." - Corisande, Setessan hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, up to two target creatures you control each gain "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let each challenge make you a better warrior." - Anthousa of Setessa

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Akroan Hoplite attacks, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of attacking creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fair fight? How could it be a fair fight? We're Akroans. They're not."

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike, vigilance Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Anax and Cymede, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Akros's greatest heroes are also its royalty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Ashen Rider enters the battlefield or dies, exile target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One offering to appease her on her arrival. Another to celebrate her departure.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Exile the top three cards of target opponent's library. −X: Put a creature card with mana value X exiled with Ashiok, Nightmare Weaver onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a Nightmare in addition to its other types. −1[0]: Exile all cards from all opponents' hands and graveyards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Battlewise Hoplite, put a +1/+1 counter on Battlewise Hoplite, then scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Chronicler of Heroes enters the battlefield, draw a card if you control a creature with a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She paints pictures with words, though not all pictures show the truth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Daxos of Meletis can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater. Whenever Daxos of Meletis deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of that player's library. You gain life equal to that card's mana value. Until end of turn, you may cast that card and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Destructive Revelry deals 2 damage to that permanent's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Stoke a fire hot enough and you'll never run out of things to burn." - Xenagos, the Reveler

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{G}{W}: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.) As long as Fleecemane Lion is monstrous, it has hexproof and indestructible.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Flying, trample Whenever you draw a card, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Minotaur creatures you control have haste. Whenever a Minotaur you control attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A warcaller merely brings the herd together. After that, the meat-hunger is all the encouragement they need.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Medomai the Ageless deals combat damage to a player, take an extra turn after this one. Medomai the Ageless can't attack during extra turns.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Pharika's Mender enters the battlefield, you may return target creature or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The direst venom becomes a panacea under Pharika's guidance. I bring it to the worthy, clinging at the edge of the abyss."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample, protection from enchantments {4}{R}{G}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) Whenever Polis Crusher deals combat damage to a player, if Polis Crusher is monstrous, destroy target enchantment that player controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap all creatures and lands you control during each other player's untap step. You may cast creature spells as though they had flash.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Time is fluid as a dance, and truth as fleeting."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from that player's graveyard or hand and exile it. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature dies, scry 1. {B}: Reaper of the Wilds gains deathtouch until end of turn. {1}{G}: Reaper of the Wilds gains hexproof until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance {W}{B}, Pay 3 life: Regenerate Sentry of the Underworld.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Athreos gathers the newly dead to be ferried across the Five Rivers That Ring the World, he sends skeletal griffins to fetch those who stray.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}{U}: Target creature an opponent controls attacks this turn if able. {1}{B}, {T}: Attacking creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her melody melds death and beauty with such artistry that even the gods weep to hear it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample Spellheart Chimera's power is equal to the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thaumaturges remain silent around chimeras, lest their words conjure even stranger beasts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top five cards of your library and separate them into two piles. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put that pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Keranos is a fickle god, delivering punishment as readily as prophecy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Put a fate counter on another target creature. {W}, {T}: Exile target creature that has a fate counter on it, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control. {B}, {T}: Exile target creature that has a fate counter on it. Its controller draws two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}, Sacrifice another creature: Tymaret, the Murder King deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker. {1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return Tymaret from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His memories remained in the Underworld, but his cruelty crossed the Rivers with him.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Underworld Cerberus can't be blocked except by three or more creatures. Cards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities. When Underworld Cerberus dies, exile it and each player returns all creature cards from their graveyard to their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Add X mana in any combination of {R} and/or {G}, where X is the number of creatures you control. [0]: Create a 2/2 red and green Satyr creature token with haste. −6: Exile the top seven cards of your library. You may put any number of creature and/or land cards from among them onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender When Akroan Horse enters the battlefield, an opponent gains control of it. At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent creates a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I know its lightness, for I have seen it fly. I know its weight, for I have seen it strike." - Brigone, soldier of Meletis

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Champion stood alone between the horde of the Returned and the shrine to Karametra, cutting down scores among hundreds. She would have been overcome if not for the aid of the temple guardians whom Karametra awakened. - The Theriad

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, Sacrifice Burnished Hart: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Forged by divine hands to wander mortal realms.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender, indestructible {10}: Monstrosity 10. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put ten +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) As long as Colossus of Akros is monstrous, it has trample and can attack as though it didn't have defender.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Flamecast Wheel: It deals 3 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beware the gifts of an ill-tempered forge god.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has flying and haste. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The gods gave us no wings to fly, but they gave us an even greater gift: imagination." - Daxos of Meletis

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The histories speak of two feuding rulers whose deaths were celebrated and whose monuments symbolized the end of their wars. In truth they were peaceful lovers, their story lost to the ages.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Purphoros once loved Nylea, the god of the hunt. His passion inspired his most astounding works of art.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature can't be blocked except by Walls. Equip {2}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The youths prattle on about heroic deeds, but avoiding the noose is a feat more daring than their entire careers." - Basarios the Blade

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Each player exiles the top card of their library face down. {7}, {T}, Sacrifice Pyxis of Pandemonium: Each player turns face up all cards they own exiled with Pyxis of Pandemonium, then puts all permanent cards among them onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Sacrifice Traveler's Amulet: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What we call magic is nothing more than hope crystallized into a destination." - Perisophia the philosopher

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has "{1}, {T}: Scry 1." (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.) Equip {1}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The price of prophecy is a vacant eye socket.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: Choose a color. Add an amount of mana of that color equal to your devotion to that color. (Your devotion to a color is the number of mana symbols of that color in the mana costs of permanents you control.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Temple of Abandon enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Abandon enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Temple of Deceit enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Deceit enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Temple of Mystery enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Mystery enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Temple of Silence enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Silence enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add {W} or {B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Temple of Triumph enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Triumph enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Philosophers speak of a place where myths wash like tides upon the shores of the real.
